summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City Light Department; authorizing the Superintendent or his designee to enter into two temporary tieback easement agreements with Plymouth Housing Group and Yale Partners, LLC that contain indemnity provisions on portions of Lots 11 through 16, Block 13, Pontius Fourth Addition to the City of Seattle, according to the plat thereof recorded in Volume 7 of Plats, Page 8, records of King County, Washington; and ratifying and confirming certain prior acts.
